The #Cardano network faces minor but unpleasant problems. Remember that this is a test-net and be patient. This phase can be expected. Teams are working hard on solutions and it might take some time.  Please do not hesitate to report all the issues you have to IOHK or Emurgo.  https://t.co/x7kD32TKWy

Day 4 Testnet Staking...  21% of all $ADA in existence has been staked (was 19%) 339 active pools (was 314 & more still coming online) 19.3m average tADA per pool (was 18.8m)  Over 2.2m tADA paid out in rewards so far! 🤑  🤘₳

The Incentivized Test Net (ITN) is Rekt in my opinion. Here is what needs to happen. 1 - Fix the software. 2 - Reset to Epoch 0. 3 - Start Over.  @InputOutputHK @emurgo_io @Cardano We are not supposed to be testing how to write scripts to keep the network alive. Too many forks.
